choices: With your Friend at her house
1.content: In which scenario will Jake be shrunk?
1.title: Prelude

choices: Other (take this interactive in another direction!)
11.content:
Currently, you are at home waiting for your food to be delivered to your house. 45 minutes ago, you ordered food from a Spanish restaurant and are waiting for the delivery person to come.

You get a phone call in what appears to be the delivery person. “Come outside, I am here.” Says the delivery person. The person on the phone had a feminine voice. You tell her that you will be right outside.

You get up and go to the door and open it. You see that the driver had parked her car in your driveway and is standing right in front of you. She is a Latina woman who appeared to be in her young 20s. She is wearing Jeans with a t-shirt and flip flops. “Hi. I’m Ashley!” The delivery lady said. You tell her that your name is Jake.

You reach out to pay for the food but the delivery person offers to bring it in for you. You tell her thank you and let her in. She says after you and you walk inside. For some reason she closed the door behind you and you become confused. She then puts the bag on the table and you reach out to pay.

The delivery lady reaches for the money and starts to sit down on your couch. You tell her that she should leave since you are going to they gym with your friends after you finish eating.

Ashley doesn’t respond and you walk up to her to tell her that she needs to leave. Ashley then looks at you and starts smiling. “I’m not going anywhere Jake.” she says. Ashley pulls out a weird looking device and fires it at you.

You look around and notice everything is getting larger, which can only mean one thing. You are shrinking! You try to run to the door but it is too late. You are already 3 inches tall. You hear loud footsteps and notice that Ashley is coming to you. You try running but it is no use. Ashley put her foot right next to you and you run into it. You fall on your butt and notice that Ashley is reaching for you.

“Now it looks like I am going to live with you!” Ashley booms while taking off her flip flops.
“Why did you do this to me!” You plead.
“I want to move out of my house. My parents are so stressful and I had enough of it.” Ashley says.
“So why did you shrink me?” You ask.
“Well, I needed you tiny so I can move in here and you don’t go out and get me into trouble.” Besides, now you can be my tiny boyfriend.” Ashley tells you.
“Look, I wouldn’t mind having a roomate. You are very beautiful. But can you just restore me back to normal size?” You say.
Ashley blushes at your comment and says, “Sorry Jake, the shrinking is permanent. But thank you for your comment.”

Ashley then goes to sit down on the couch and puts her feet up on the table. “You know, being on my feet all day is making my feet hurt. Rub them for me Jake.” Ashley says while putting you on the table.

Do you rub her feet or try to escape?
11.title: Home

15.content:
In this scenario, the interaction will be told from the second person perspective.

You decide that you want to hang out with your best friend Emily at her house. Emily is 21 years old, with black hair, weighs 170 pounds, and is white. She is also 5’11”.

You knock on Emily’s door and wait. Emily opens up the door and invites you in. She is wearing a mini skirt and only a blue bra. She is also barefoot.

“Hey, Jake! How’s it going?” Emily asks you.

“I’m doing fine, Emily! What about you?” You respond as both of you go to her room.

“I’m doing great!” Emily says. “I’ll be right back. I need to go pee really badly”

You decide to just sit on Emily’s bed and wait for her to return. Out of nowhere, you shrink to 3 inches tall.

Everything looks so humongous and you hear Emily come back into her room.

“That’s strange. Where did Jake go?” Emily asks.

Emily then looks at her bed.

Is she aware or unaware of your shrunken form?
15.title: With your Friend at her house

info.brief_description: A man named Jake shrinks during various scenarios. No Giant males allowed
info.description: You are a 21 year old man named Jake. You are 6’4 and weigh 210 pounds. You have dark brown hair and green eyes. You have just graduated college and now it is summer. Take on different scenarios in which Jake will shrink.
